Command line toolsÂ¶

MeerSOLAR have several command line interface (CLI), which allows advanced users to

usage: run_meersolar [-h] --workdir WORKDIR [--non_solar_data]
                     [--no_basic_cal] [--no_imaging] [--no_cal_partition]
                     [--no_cal_flag] [--no_import_model] [--no_noise_cal]
                     [--no_applycal] [--no_target_split] [--no_polcal]
                     [--no_selfcal] [--no_selfcal_split] [--no_apply_selfcal]
                     [--no_ap_selfcal] [--no_solar_selfcal]
                     [--do_sidereal_cor] [--do_forcereset_weightflag]
                     [--target_scans [TARGET_SCANS ...]]
                     [--freqrange FREQRANGE] [--timerange TIMERANGE]
                     [--uvrange UVRANGE] [--solint SOLINT] [--do_pbcor]
                     [--weight WEIGHT] [--robust ROBUST] [--minuv MINUV]
                     [--image_freqres IMAGE_FREQRES]
                     [--image_timeres IMAGE_TIMERES] [--pol POL]
                     [--clean_threshold CLEAN_THRESHOLD]
                     [--cutout_rsun CUTOUT_RSUN] [--no_multiscale]
                     [--no_solar_mask] [--no_overlay] [--no_apply_parang]
                     [--cpu_frac CPU_FRAC] [--mem_frac MEM_FRAC]
                     [--keep_backup] [--remote_logger]
                     [--logger_alivetime LOGGER_ALIVETIME] [--n_nodes N_NODES]
                     msname

Run MeerSOLAR for calibration and imaging of solar observations.

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit

###################
Essential parameters
###################:
  msname                Measurement set name
  --workdir WORKDIR     Working directory (default: None)
  --non_solar_data      Enable non-solar data mode (default: True)

###################
Advanced pipeline parameters
###################:
  --no_basic_cal        Disable basic gain calibration (default: True)
  --no_imaging          Disable final imaging (default: True)
  --no_cal_partition    Disable calibration MS partitioning (default: True)
  --no_cal_flag         Disable initial calibration flagging (default: True)
  --no_import_model     Disable model import (default: True)
  --no_noise_cal        Disable noise calibration (default: True)
  --no_applycal         Disable application of calibration solutions (default:
                        True)
  --no_target_split     Disable target data split (default: True)
  --no_polcal           Disable polarization calibration (default: True)
  --no_selfcal          Disable self-calibration (default: True)
  --no_selfcal_split    Disable post-selfcal split (default: True)
  --no_apply_selfcal    Disable application of self-calibration solutions
                        (default: True)
  --no_ap_selfcal       Disable amplitude+phase self-calibration (default:
                        True)
  --no_solar_selfcal    Disable solar-specific self-calibration (default:
                        True)
  --do_sidereal_cor     Sidereal motion correction for Sun (disabled by
                        default) (default: False)
  --do_forcereset_weightflag
                        Force reset of weights and flags (disabled by default)
                        (default: False)
  --no_apply_parang     Disable parallactic angle rotation during imaging
                        (default: True)

###################
Advanced calibration and imaging parameters
###################:
  --target_scans [TARGET_SCANS ...]
                        List of target scans to process (space-separated, e.g.
                        3 5 7) (default: [])
  --freqrange FREQRANGE
                        Frequency range to select during imaging (e.g.
                        '100~110MHz') (default: )
  --timerange TIMERANGE
                        Time range to select during imaging (e.g.
                        '09:30:00~09:45:00') (default: )
  --uvrange UVRANGE     UV range to filter data (e.g. '>100klambda') (default:
                        )
  --solint SOLINT       Solution interval for calibration (e.g. 'int', '5min',
                        'inf') (default: 5min)
  --do_pbcor            Apply primary beam correction after imaging (default:
                        False)
  --weight WEIGHT       Imaging weighting scheme (e.g. 'briggs', 'natural',
                        'uniform') (default: briggs)
  --robust ROBUST       Robust parameter for Briggs weighting (-2 to +2)
                        (default: 0.0)
  --minuv MINUV         Minimum baseline length (in wavelengths) to include in
                        imaging (default: 0)
  --image_freqres IMAGE_FREQRES
                        Output image frequency resolution in MHz (-1 = full)
                        (default: -1)
  --image_timeres IMAGE_TIMERES
                        Output image time resolution in seconds (-1 = full)
                        (default: -1)
  --pol POL             Stokes parameter(s) to image (e.g. 'I', 'XX', 'RR',
                        'IQUV') (default: I)
  --clean_threshold CLEAN_THRESHOLD
                        Clean threshold in sigma for final deconvolution
                        (default: 1.0)
  --cutout_rsun CUTOUT_RSUN
                        Field of view cutout radius in solar radii (default:
                        2.5)
  --no_multiscale       Disable multiscale CLEAN for extended structures
                        (default: True)
  --no_solar_mask       Disable use solar disk mask during deconvolution
                        (default: True)
  --no_overlay          Generate overlay plot on GOES SUVI after imaging
                        (default: True)

###################
Advanced hardware resource parameters for local system or per node on HPC cluster
###################:
  --cpu_frac CPU_FRAC   Fraction of CPU usuage per node (default: 0.8)
  --mem_frac MEM_FRAC   Fraction of memory usuage per node (default: 0.8)
  --keep_backup         Keep backup of intermediate steps (default: False)
  --remote_logger       Use remote logger (default: False)
  --logger_alivetime LOGGER_ALIVETIME
                        Keep remote logger alive for this many hours
                        (Otherwise, logger will be removed after 15minutes of
                        inactivity) (default: 0)

###################
Advanced HPC settings
###################:
  --n_nodes N_NODES     Number of compute nodes to use (0 means local cluster)
                        (default: 0)
